essay:
Background Information

For thousands of years, the land that we know of today as the state of Illinois was home to many indigenous people deserving of our respect and acknowledgement. The campus of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC) in particular is the land of the Peoria, Kaskaskia, Piankashaw, Wea, Miami, Mascoutin, Odawa, Sauk, Mesquaki, Kickapoo, Potawatomi, Ojibwe, and Chickasaw Nations.
